casebody.data:
Prince LEWIS
v.
COMMISSIONER OF CORRECTION Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided September 13, 2016

Vishal K. Garg, in support of the petition.

Stephen R. Finucane, assistant attorney general, in opposition.

The petitioner Prince Lewis' petition for certification for appeal from the *680Appellate Court, 166 Conn.App. 22, 140 A.3d 414 (2016), is denied.
